column4: I killed x-window, and now ubuntu loads directly to console and when I startx, it goes straight to gnome, skipping the session manager.  I want to be able to choose my desktop environment again; how do I get the session manager to load on start up again. :(  Forgive my noobness. hehe..
well...to get the login, use sudo gdm
but I'm not sure how to always get that
thanks that'll probably help me a lot :)
